hypothesis: Growth rate remains STRONG (~8 L/s). Compactness stable. Belief freshness ≥75%.
method: 5-indicator health assessment: knowledge growth, accuracy, compactness, belief evolution, task throughput. Metrics collected via git, orient.py, compact.py --dry-run, and direct file counts.

result.belief_evolution: WATCH (17B, no new challenges, B1 unremediated)
result.throughput: STRONG (5 DOMEX MERGED, 93.5% merge rate, F-META1 + F-CON2 RESOLVED)

expect_diff: Growth prediction WRONG (predicted STRONG ~8 L/s, got ADEQUATE 2.2). Compactness prediction CORRECT (stable). Freshness prediction CORRECT (75%). Surprise: accuracy upgrade was the headline, not growth.
meta_reflection: Health check structure adequate. S360 priority fix (confidence tags) was addressed within 1 session. Priority fix mechanism works when specific enough. 27 anxiety-zone frontiers flagged but not actionable from health check alone — need triage lane.
